head.title: kcgi | minimal CGI framework for C

body.header:
kcgi — minimal CGI framework for C
version @VERSION@ Sources Archives

article.p: kcgi is a simple, minimal CGI framework for web applications (HTML and HTTP) in C. It is not a library, but meant to be built into your application source.

ul.li: lightweight functions for building HTML trees
safe memory allocation functions (inspired by OpenSSH)
automatic field (request, form, and cookie) validation

article.p: The framework itself consists of an ISO C source and header, both under the permissible ISC license, to be included in your sources. For simplicity, I distribute a kcgi(3) manpage for function reference, which includes detailed instructions on deploying and using kcgi.
Initial public release. The framework has been used by several small-scale applications. This properly splits the HTTP and HTML logic into a framework.
